pkgmetadata.longdescription: A Toolbox for Linear Discriminant Analysis with Penalties // Integrates several popular high-dimensional methods based on Linear Discriminant Analysis (LDA) and provides a comprehensive and user-friendly toolbox for linear, semi-parametric and tensor-variate classification as mentioned in Yuqing Pan, Qing Mai and Xin Zhang (2019) arXiv:1904.03469. Functions are included for covariate adjustment, model fitting, cross validation and prediction.
